entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
